definition: warp (the vertical threads in weaving)/vertical/longitudinal/north-south (lines of longitude)/lengthwise/to release/to indulge/even if

sentences.english: In deep derision outlaughs the foeman.
sentences.chinese: 敵人極盡嘲弄地縱聲大笑。

sentences.english: She wept at once, with sudden, wild abandonment , in her sister's arms.
sentences.chinese: 她馬上縱聲哭倒在妹妹的懷裏。

sentences.english: He mentioned this to his wife and conjectured aloud that the artist must have made a mistake.
sentences.chinese: 費希向他太太提出這點，並縱聲猜測雕塑家弄錯了。

sentences.english: In deep derision outlaughs the foe man.
sentences.chinese: 敵人極盡嘲弄地縱聲大笑。
